TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsnEncodedData extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表抽象語法標記法 (一) (ASN.1) 編碼的資料。

span.span: Represents Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象語法標記法 One (ASN.1)，其定義於 CCITT 建議 X.208，會指定將會以序列方式傳輸的抽象物件的方法。Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1), which is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.208, is a way to specify abstract objects that will be serially transmitted. 表示為字串和零的這類物件的 ASN.1 規則集稱為辨別編碼規則 (DER)，和區段 8.7 CCITT Recommendation X.509 中定義。The set of ASN.1 rules for representing such objects as strings of ones and zeros is called the Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER), and is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.509, Section 8.7. 這些編碼方法目前在使用.NET Framework 中的密碼編譯命名空間。These encoding methods are currently used by the cryptography namespace in the .NET Framework. 請注意，是否遇到未知的資料類型時，存取此類別的執行個體時，會傳回資料做為十六進位字串。Note that if an unknown data type is encountered while accessing an instance of this class, data is returned as a hexadecimal string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CPP/asnencodeddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CS/asnencodeddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/VB/asnencodeddata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要列印的 Abstract Syntax Notation 一個 ASN.1 編碼資料，或將資訊輸出到文字方塊中，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you need to print Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data or output the information to a text box. 使用`multiLine`參數來控制輸出的版面配置。Use the `multiLine` parameter to control the layout of the output. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class.
